entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump White House is now a COVID-19 hot spot.  Americans  demand for the WH: No testing, No tracing, and No protections.  They get what they demanded of meat processing plant workers. It is only fair.  Demand that none can stop working f they are sick.
